Installation 
================================================

Installing the Library
________________________________________________

This library can be installed with ``pip install -e`` from the
top directory if it is already cloned. 

You can also clone the repository using ``git clone https://github.com/rlaitner/APC-Final-Project``


Installing Python3
_______________________________________________

If you do not already have Python3 installed please see [Python Downloads](https://www.python.org/downloads/)
for installation directions for your operating system. 



Installing Sphinx
________________________________________________

If you do not already have Sphinx installed please see [Sphinx Installation](https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/usage/installation.html)
for installation directions for your operating system.
